parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The start value is 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to ZONE.
